Posts.Content: I Am 30yrs Old,i Have Been Dealing With Cysts On Both Breast!!!very Painful Lump In My Nipples,it Gets Real Red Size Of A Golf Ball,i Only Get One At A Time,but It Is Very Difficult To Go On Through The Day In Pain,the Lump Will Be There For 2 Weeks "in Pain",my Doc Told Me All I Can Do Is Put A Warm Compressed Hot Washcloth On It To Help Pain,but Not Much Else Works For Me,i Have Had Them Asparited And Even Cut Out,they Still Come Back,i Do Not Drink Caffine Or Eat Sweets Anymore Cuz They Say This May Increase The Pain. I Have Taken Way To Many Antibiotics They Dont Work For Me Anymore.i Had Three Mamograms And I Came Back Ok...i Was Told To Keep Getting Them But I Just Lost My Insurannce,very Scary,i Hope I Do Not Get Cancer From This.i Worry Alot..if Anyone Else Has This Problem. Laura
Posts.Title: Painful Cysts In My Breast

Posts.Content: I TOO HAVE FIBROCYSTIC BREASTS,IM NEW ON THESE BOARDS.ANYWAY I AM 30 I WAS ONLY 21 WHEN I FIRST STARTED TO HAVE VERY VERY PAINFUL LUMP ON MY NIPPLE,I ONLY GET ONE LUMP AT A TIME,BUT IN BOTH BREAST.THE BUMPS ARE ALWAYS ON THE NIPPLE,THEY HURT SO BAD,DOCTORS FEEL SO BAD,I HAVE HAD MAMO'S/BIOBSY/ASPRAITED/CUT OUT,NOTHING WORKS,I HAD 3 MAMOGRAMS SINCE I WAS 21,LAST ONE 5 YRS AGO,I HAVE NO HEALTH INSURANCE NOW,SO IM SCARED TO DEATH,THESE PAINFUL LUMPS ARE COMING BACK ALL THE TIME NOW,I WAS TOLD BY MY DOC TO PUT HOT WASHCLOTH ON IT AS HOT AS I CAN STAND IT,WELL I DO THAT IT BRINGS MY LUMP TO A HEAD A BREAKS OPEN,LEAVING PUSS PORING OUT,SORRY I DONT MEAN TO BE GROSS,VERY SAD.BUT THEN I HAVE SOME RELIEF TILL THE NEXT TIME.THEY HAVE GIVIN ME SO MANY ANTIBIOTICS,THEY DONT WORK ANYMORE...WHAT SCARES ME THE MOST,IS WHEN I READ HOW OTHER WOMEN WITH CYSTS IN BREAST DONT HAVE PAIN,IM SMALL BREASTED,BUT STILL VERY CONCERENED,IM IN ALOT OF PAIN.ANYONE HAS ANY OF THESE SYMPTOMS OR CAN HELP ME thank you LAURA
Posts.Title: fibrocystic breasts/lumpy breasts/ultrasound

Posts.Content: I Have Had Very Painful Cysts In My Breasts Since I Was 21 Now I Am 30,i Dont Have Health Insurance,but I Had A Mamogram/biobsy,i Came Back Clear,that Was 5 Years Ago..i Just Had A Cysts A Month Ago I Got A Painful Lump On My Nipple It Got To Where It Was Red As Big As A Golf Ball,i Went To The Doctor He Gave Me A Antibiotic,it Finally Came To A Boil (with Warm Compression) And Opened Up,puss Comes Out. I Can Go For Months Without One But One Always Come Back.just One,very Strange.anybody Have These Symptoms??
Posts.Title: Lots Of Fibroadenomas - My Story
